definition: White area (area controlled by the KMT during the Second Revolutionary War 1927-1937)

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The enemy division under Liu Ho-ting was far away in Chienning in the White area of Fukien, and was unlikely to cross into Kiangsi.
sentences.chinese: 敌军刘和鼎师远在福建白区的建宁，不一定越入江西。

sentences.english: The story took place before liberation in areas controlled by Kuomintang.
sentences.chinese: 故事发生在解放前的“白区”。

definition: former Ninggang county in Jiangxi, now within Jinggangshan county level city 井岡山市|井冈山市[Jing3 gang1 shan1 shi4] in Ji'an 吉安, Jiangxi
red bandit (i.e. PLA soldier (during the civil war) or Chinese communist (Tw))
Xiang Ying (1898-1941), communist general involved in forming the New Fourth Army 新四軍, killed in 1941 during the New Fourth Army incident 皖南事变
to eliminate counterrevolutionaries (abbr. for 肅清反革命份子|肃清反革命分子[su4 qing1 fan3 ge2 ming4 fen4 zi3])
peasant movement (abbr. for 農民運動|农民运动[nong2 min2 yun4 dong4])
farmer's cooperative/abbr. for 農民協會|农民协会
Shanxi 山西, Chahar 察哈爾|察哈尔 and Hebei 河北 (three provinces of the Republic of China in the period 1912-1936)

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Su1 wei2 ai1 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Communist International or Comintern (1919-1943), also known as the Third International 第三國際|第三国际[Di4 san1 Guo2 ji4]
